templates.name: Baseline Description
templates.template: Describe what you see in this video frame in detail.

templates.name: Structured Analysis
templates.template: Analyze this video frame and provide: 1) Main subjects, 2) Actions occurring, 3) Setting/environment, 4) Notable details.

templates.name: Narrative Style
templates.template: Describe this scene as if you're narrating a story. What's happening, who's involved, and what's the context?

templates.name: Technical Details
templates.template: Provide a technical description of this frame including: composition, lighting, subjects, actions, and any text visible.

templates.name: Comprehensive Analysis
templates.template: Analyze this video frame comprehensively: describe the scene, identify all subjects and objects, explain what actions are taking place, note the setting and atmosphere, and mention any text or graphics visible.
